name: Bay Ran Opticals - UXG 1420
description:
UXG1420 | DAA1401  Interactive Advertisement Project (build in Unity2D WebGL)

Ever wondered how the famous optical illusion "My Wife and my Mother-in-law" would look animated? We devised a potential marketing campaign in this mini-project to demonstrate the capabilities that Unity has to offer beyond game development. This plug-in was built in a week and submitted as part of an assignment for our digital production module at DigiPen Institute of Technology Singapore.

Paying homage to Ray Ban's Never Hide campaign and its Pop Art influences comes an interactive advertisement developed by Seth Khaw, Kenneth Chan, Megan Lee and Lin Yue Yang. WebGL supported.

Visit our portfolios at: https://linktr.ee/digipensg

THE TEAM

All members were involved in coming up with the concept and the project's design direction.
